name: Baraka Virgin Coconut Oil
description: BARAKA Virgin Coconut Oil is produced using the fresh, mature kernel of only the highest quality coconuts. This oil has not undergone any chemical refining, bleaching or deodorizing or any other process which would lead to the alteration of the nature of the oil. Virgin coconut oil is the purest form of coconut oil and has a colorless appearance with a mild fresh coconut aroma. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
